1.title: Boj the Collector
1.plot: All Boj's buddies have collections and Boj wants one too. But he loves everything in Giggly Park so much that he can't decide which things to collect!

2.title: Musical Mayhem
2.plot: Boj's buddies are all practicing the Cloppity Concerto to play at the Giggly Gig. But when Denzil breaks his guitar, Boj shows him how he can still play at the concert.

3.title: Hoppy Birthday
3.plot: It's Rupa's birthday! Before Mia can hand her the wrapped up skipping rope in comes Gavin with his gift: the Skipsolo 800! Can Boj get the buddies all skipping together?

4.title: Under the Giggly Moon
4.plot: A father-son camping trip in Giggly Park ends up in chaos! But Boj has a boj-a-boom idea to save the day and get everyone camping together.

5.title: In the Hothouse
5.plot: When Mia and Rupa disagree over how to help Mr Cloppity water the plants in his hothouse and break the hose - Boj invents a game they can all play to get the plants watered.

6.title: Let's Get Rummaging
6.plot: The rummage sale to raise money for a new Giggly Park fountain is a bit of flop. But thanks to Boj's idea they re-use the unwanted items to create a one-of-a-kind fountain!

7.title: Giggly Holiday
7.plot: Boj discovers that Mia and her family have never had a holiday. Boj has a boj-a-boom idea and asks Mr Cloppity and the buddies to help him make a mini Hawaii in Giggly Park.

8.title: Flat as a Pancake
8.plot: It is a hot day in Giggly Park and Denzil's paddling pool has a puncture. Boj has a boj-a-boom idea to mend the leaky pool - with Mrs Woof's extra sticky pancakes!

9.title: Giggly Rink
9.plot: There's an ice rink in Giggly Park. Gavin has got the gear but he hasn't got the nerve to skate. With a little helping hand from Boj, Gavin is encouraged out on to the ice.

10.title: Bouncing Boj
10.plot: Mr Cloppity gets stuck up high in his cherry picker! Boj improvises with an exercise trampoline to get him down - and inspires all his buddies to get bouncing for apples.Mr Cloppity gets stuck up high in his cherry picker! Boj improvises with an exercise trampoline to get him down - and inspires all his buddies to get bouncing for apples.

11.title: High Flying Drying
11.plot: It is a very windy day - perfect for flying kites and drying Pops' clothes - but he's run out of washing line! Now how will he dry his clothes? How about making washy-kites!

12.title: Non Stop Pops
12.plot: Pops is unfit, so with Rupa's help, Boj sets about getting him in tip top condition using Pops' love of music to make it fun!

13.title: The Sleep Under
13.plot: Mia and the Twitchlets are coming for a sleep-over at Boj's house. After a whirlwind evening of breakages and demands - how will they ever settle the little Twitchlets down?

14.title: Song for Mimi
14.plot: It's Mimi's birthday! Pops makes Mimi a drum kit. Boj wants to record a special song for her but can't find a quiet spot. How about a mix of all the noises from Giggly Park!

15.title: Rainbow for Rupa
15.plot: Boj shows Rupa and her family that a homemade approach to decorating a playroom can be fun and rewarding. Soon the Nibblits are all getting in on the artistic act!

16.title: Sneezy Snufferoos
16.plot: Boj's friends are all ill and can't come out to play. But Boj finds a way for his house-bound buddies to still talk together - and listen to Pops on 'Boj-a-boom Radio' too!

17.title: Starfishing
17.plot: Pops takes Boj, Gavin and Mia for an evening of stargazing. But Mia wants to catch a star! With a bit of imagination and a bucket, they do - now sceptic Gavin wants one too!

18.title: The Best Nest
18.plot: Pops is distraught - he's lost his hat! Boj and Denzil find that it is now the Giggly Warbler's nest. Can they find an alternative nest for the warbler and return Pops' hat?

19.title: Robot Recycler
19.plot: Boj, Rupa and Gavin are making toys out of recycling. When Mr Cloppity's buggy gets stuck in the mud, the buddies come to the rescue with recycled toy robots and rope.

20.title: Carry on Carrot
20.plot: Mrs Woof's soup is missing Mr Cloppity's carrots - his crop has failed! When Boj and his buddies discover a giant carrot - how can they deliver it to the Diner?

21.title: Mia's Pet
21.plot: Mia has a pet ladybird in a box. When Mr Cloppity explains that ladybirds need to fly free, Boj plants a mini Giggly Park outside Mia's house for the ladybird to call home.

22.title: Giggly Park Rescue Squad
22.plot: Boj, Denzil and Gavin become heroes for the day! Rescuing the residents of Giggly Park from a variety of mishaps and creating a game they can all play happily together.

23.title: The Amazing Cloppity
23.plot: Boj and his buddies discover Mr Cloppity's skills as a magician and encourage him to put on a show. When it all goes horribly wrong, can Boj's finale trick save the show?

24.title: The Big-Big Bike Ride
24.plot: Boj and Mia are riding their bikes around Giggly Park. But Mia feels babyish about still having training wheels. Can she get the confidence to ride on two wheels?

25.title: Denzil's Lost Teddy
25.plot: Denzil has lost his treasured teddy bear, Snugsy. The Twitchlets have Snugsy and they won't give him back! How can Boj get him back to Denzil and keep the Twitchlets happy?

26.title: Boj and the Booms
26.plot: Boj and his buddies form a pop band. When Rupa and Mia walk out due to musical differences Boj needs a boj-a-boom idea for something they can both play together.

27.title: Watch the Birdie
27.plot: Giggly Park Rangers Boj and Rupa are trying to spot the never-spotted long-legged runner bird. Will they fulfil their, and Commander Cloppity's dream of spotting one?

28.title: Keeping Mr Cloppity
28.plot: When the buddies mis-hear Mr Cloppity say something is worn out and needs to leave the park, they think he means he is leaving and set about getting him to stay.

29.title: Puppet Show
29.plot: Boj helps Mia to look after the Twitchlets. But they quickly get stuck putting on a never-ending puppet show! How can they get the Twitchlets to entertaining themselves?

30.title: The Peace Prize
30.plot: The Mayor is coming to judge the Best Park Competition and the buddies are helping tidy up. But when everything spills from Mr Cloppity's buggy, how will they hide the mess?

31.title: The Duckling
31.plot: Rupa discovers a little lost duckling. How can they get it to swim to its family on the duck pond island? With Mia's toy duck and Boj's boj-a-boom idea!

32.title: Picnic in the Park
32.plot: Boj, Mimi and Pops are excited about joining the Woofs for a family picnic. When rain sadly puts a halt to the festivities, Boj has an idea for an 'outside inside' picnic.

33.title: Fun and Games
33.plot: Boj has brilliant Boj-a-boom ideas for ways his buddies can play together ("Rupa, Denzil, Gavin and Mia love his muddy messy games!")... And best of all, whenever the fun looks like being over, Boj can always make things better. So come and join in with Boj and let's all have a giggle in Giggly Park!

34.title: Still as Statues
34.plot: Boj finds Mia upset because her paintings of the Twitchlets are ruined - they were meant to be a birthday present for her mum. Can Boj help Mia to make a new present?

35.title: Sports G'day
35.plot: It's Sports Day in Giggly Park and Boj mistakenly wins all the medals. With only one race left, can Boj think of a boj-a-boom idea that will help his buddies all win a medal?

36.title: Gavin's Got Talent
36.plot: The buddies put on a talent show. But when Gavin's act, the Mega-Robo-Dancer 64i doesn't work, the show can't go on. Boj persuades Gavin that he has his own special talent!

37.title: The Giggly Park Express
37.plot: With just cardboard boxes and a bit of imagination - Boj and his buddies make a train to take Denzil and his teddies on a trip around the world.

38.title: Picky Eater
38.plot: Boj and Mia are invited to Rupa's for pizza. But Mia doesn't like eating mixed up food. Can Boj help Mia enjoy dinner at the Nibblits' with the mix-it-up song?

39.title: The Giggly Dig
39.plot: Boj digs up Mr Cloppity's old time capsule. Now his buddies want their own to bury. When they miss their buried treasures, Boj finds one thing they can all bury together.

40.title: Pops's Outback Trek
40.plot: Pops is homesick. So Boj cheers him up by recreating an Outback trek. Will Pops realise that he doesn't have to miss home... he IS home, right here in Giggly Park.

41.title: Doctor Denzil
41.plot: Denzil & Boj are playing at being doctors. When Dr Woof sprains his paw, they get a chance to practise on a "real patient" But how will they get him home?

42.title: Happy Harvesters
42.plot: Boj's buddies are off to Mr Cloppity's allotment to harvest their vegetables. When they discover a cheeky slug has eaten them, Boj finds something else for his buddies to harvest!

43.title: Buzzy Boj
43.plot: Mr Cloppity's bees have not returned back to their hive. So Boj has a boj-a-boom idea to encourage them back with a little help from some buzzy kazoos.

44.title: Bedtime for Rupa
44.plot: Rupa is off to bed early to rest before her big gymnastics competition. But with all of the noises from Giggly Park keeping her awake, can Boj help to get Rupa off to sleep?

45.title: Blast Off Buddies
45.plot: When Denzil accidentally breaks Gavin's new toy rocket, Boj has a boj-a-boom that will make Gavin a rocket that will actually fly and fix his buddies friendship. Boj a Moon!

46.title: Boj-a-balloon
46.plot: It is a hot day in Giggly Park and Denzil's paddling pool has a puncture. Boj has a boj-a-boom idea to mend the leaky pool - with Mrs Woof's extra sticky pancakes!

47.title: Out of the Box
47.plot: Boj, Pops and Mimi are invited to the Bleat's high tech house for tea. But when the house breaks down, Boj persuades the Bleats that gadgets aren't the only way to entertain!

48.title: Double Cloppity
48.plot: Mr Cloppity is in a pickle. Though he's got the sneezy snufferoos, he's got so much to do in Giggly Park. Can Boj and his buddies help Mr Cloppity be in two places at once?

49.title: Sploshy Fun
49.plot: When Denzil and Rupa fail to win their swimming badges. Boj encourages his buddies to have sploshy fun in the pool and win a new badge at the same time!

50.title: Keep on Going
50.plot: Boj, Rupa and Gavin are trekking for their Ranger survival badges. When Gavin's satnav boots go on the blink, Boj uses a bush craft boj-a-boom idea to get them all back on track!

51.title: Adventure Camp
51.plot: When Cousin Hoj joins Boj and his buddies on adventure camp, everyone has trouble making friends with him. Boj has a fun boj-a-boom idea to make Hoj fit in with his friends.

imdb.title: Boj
plot: Animation. _Boj_ (qv) the bilby and his musical parents move from the Australian outback to the cosmopolitan community of Giggly Park.
